alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 6:02PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Geneva, northwestern Walton and northwestern Holmes Counties through 545 PM CST... At 502 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Samson to near Florala to Baker. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, De Funiak Springs, Hartford, Samson, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Coffee Springs, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Kellys Crossroads, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Glendale, Izagora, New Harmony, New Hope, Piney Grove, Caney Creek and Earlytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
